item.description: Join David Homa of Resilient Roots for a fun night of education.Now is the time to start planning ahead for August, the best time to start planting out for your Winter Crops.  Learn how you can maximize your growing season with different types of Season Extension structures. Great at this time of year for getting a head start on warmer weather dependent plants as well longer season selections(ie: Ginger!). David will also discuss plant selections  and planting schedules for extending your growing season into the Winter using cold hardy varieties as well as early Spring plantings. $10

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Season Extension Workshop(Grow food year round!)
